text.headline: Adding the 2nd Course
text.text:
Monte Rei Golf & Country Club is a private club located in the Algarve region of Portugal. The resort features Monte Rei North Golf Course, a clubhouse, a spa, and a variety of accommodation options. Monte Rei is a popular winter destination for golfers and other luxury travelers.

OLH Properties, a Hong Kong-based real estate development company, acquired the resort in 2017. The company has plans to invest in the property and expand adding Monte Rei South Golf Course, add new accommodation options, and improve all amenities. OLH Properties is also planning to build a new luxury hotel as well.

In March 2019, Monte Rei Golf & Country Club announced that it would be developing a second golf course, designed by Jack Nicklaus. The new course will be located adjacent to the resort's existing North Course.

The additional Nicklaus Design course will further solidify Monte Rei's reputation as one of the premier golf destinations in Europe.
